name: Milk Powder
description: Client has 5 children, age 5, 4, 2, 1 years old and 22 days old. Client has been unemployed since birth of first child. Husband is on unpaid leave in order to support caregiving of children since client just gave birth, hence, is unable to receive his daily pay. Family is currently pending approval for financial assistance. Family hopes for urgent support of a few tins of Abbott Similac Gain 5MO Growing-up Milk Stage 3, a few packets of Huggies Pants L and Huggies Pants XXL. Kindly contact/WhatsApp me at 98598768 for further liaison, thank you!

name: Milk Powder
description: Family has 7 children. Father is the only sole breadwinner as mother stays home to take care of the children. Financial situation is tight in the family and the parents are looking support for milk powder for their 10months old son. (Frisolac Gold Stage 2)

name: Milk Powder
description: Mother (F/22) gave birth in Feb-2025 to her son (M/7months), and is currently staying with her parents and younger sister (currently schooling) in a 1-room rental flat. Both parents are low-income earners, and mother is a full-time caregiver for child. Father is not working as he is pending incarceration. Family is struggling financially, and hopes to receive milk donations [ENFAMIL PRO A+ (0 to 12months)] to support child.

name: Milk powder
description: Client is a mother to a 1 year old daughter. Her husband struggles to find a full-time employment. Client is unemployed due to caregiving responsibility. She is also expecting a newborn in a few months' time. Hence, the family faces tight finances due to lack of income to the household.

name: MIlk Powder
description: Client (M/57) is currently unemployed and has chronic medical conditions. He lives in a 2 room rental flat with a family of 5. The family is facing financial hardship and is struggling to afford basic necessities. For further details, feel free to reach out to Kritikaa at 8777 0959 or email to kritikaa.subramaniam@thkmc.org.sg to liase. Thank you.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Norlizawati Binte Hamid

name: Baby safety gate
description: hii ! we have a Client who is currently pregnant just shifted into their new rental flat with her partner and children. As she is nearing her EDD, she is hoping to ensure that her new rental flat has sufficient basic furniture from donors to prepare for the arrival of newborn given her tight financial situation. We hope that this baby safety gate will be helpful for the family and to ensure child's safety, donor to kindly cover transport arrangement and delivery cost please. Thank you

contact.org: Allkin Family Service Centre @ Ang Mo Kio 230
contact.name: Tasya Puspita Maulany

name: Fridge
description: Family of 4 with 2 school-going children staying in a 2-room rental flat who requires a fridge as their current one is faulty. Single mother is unable to work due to health issues. Would greatly appreciate if donor is able to cover transportation costs.

contact.org: MSF Social Service Office @ Kreta Ayer
contact.name: Mohamad Harith

passiton.name: LG GL131SQW Bar Fridge (90L)
passiton.description:
- Compact LG bar fridge
- Perfect for small spaces
- 90L capacity
- Energy efficient
- Annual energy cost: ~$50
- Dimensions: 463 x 820 x 500 mm
- Features a horizontal pocket handle
- In good working condition, hardly use. 
- Some scratches on the door due to the magnets.

name: Wheel Chair
description: Senior request one wheelchair with small wheels. Compact and maneuverable.

passiton.name: Hospital bed &wheel chair contraption
passiton.description: Recipient to arrange for own collection as donor is financially not able to. Seek your compassion & understanding
passiton.location: Bukit Batok , Bukit Panjang, Choa Chu Kang, Dairy Farm, Hillview

name: Wheelchair
description: Client, female, 83, lives alone in a one-room rental flat and has multiple health conditions that requires frequent medical follow-ups at the hospital. Due to her declining mobility and the need to attend regular TCU appointments and other medical reviews, having a wheelchair would greatly support her ability to travel safely for her appointments. Her daughter, who checks in only occasionally, is unable to provide consistent assistance. A wheelchair will therefore enhance her independence, reduce fall risks, and ensure timely access to essential medical care.

passiton.name: Wheelchair
passiton.description: Life Line Brand. Still in good condition; mostly used within house.
